walkthroughs.title: TestDriver Walkthrough
walkthroughs.description:
Test your app with a computer-use agent in minutes.
This walkthrough will show you how to set up TestDriver and run your first test.

steps.title: Set up TestDriver
steps.description:
Install TestDriver in the active workspace via NPM.
[Run Setup](command:testdriver.init)

steps.title: Chat with TestDriver
steps.description:
You can talk to testdrivery by tagging them in chat. 
[Open Chat](command:workbench.action.chat.open)

steps.title: Build your first test
steps.description:
Type `@testdriverai /try click on the menu bar` in the chat window. TestDriver will execute the commands and make a new test file.
[Try it out](command:testdriver.try)

steps.title: Run your test
steps.description:
Type `@testdriverai /try click on the menu bar` in the chat window. TestDriver will execute the commands and make a new test file.
[Try it out](command:testing.runAll)

walkthroughs.title: TestDriver Generation Walkthrough
walkthroughs.description:
Test your app with a computer-use agent in minutes.
This walkthrough will show you how to set up TestDriver and run your first test.

steps.title: Open a Terminal
steps.description:
Open a terminal in VS Code to interact with your project.
[Open Terminal](command:workbench.action.terminal.new)

steps.title: Run TestDriver Generate
steps.description:
Run the TestDriver web test by typing `web 5` in the terminal.
[Run Test](command:workbench.action.terminal.sendSequence?%7B%22text%22%3A%22%2Fgenerate%20web%205%5Cn%22%7D)

steps.title: Run your test
steps.description:
Type `@testdriverai /try click on the menu bar` in the chat window. TestDriver will execute the commands and make a new test file.
[Try it out](command:testing.runAll)

walkthroughs.title: TestDriver Deployment Walkthrough
walkthroughs.description:
Test your app with a computer-use agent in minutes.
This walkthrough will show you how to set up TestDriver and run your first test.

steps.title: Create a new branch
steps.description:
Type `@testdriverai /branch create new-feature` in the chat window. TestDriver will create a new branch for your changes.
[Create Branch](command:git.branch)

steps.title: Stage your new tests
steps.description:
Type `@testdriverai /try click on the menu bar` in the chat window. TestDriver will execute the commands and make a new test file.
[Try it out](command:git.stageAll)

steps.title: Commit your tests
steps.description:
Type `@testdriverai /try click on the menu bar` in the chat window. TestDriver will execute the commands and make a new test file.
[Try it out](command:git.commit)

steps.title: Push new tests
steps.description:
Type `@testdriverai /try click on the menu bar` in the chat window. TestDriver will execute the commands and make a new test file.
[Try it out](command:git.push)

steps.title: Deploy your app
steps.description:
Click the link below to deploy your app.
[Deploy Now](https://docs.testdriver.ai/guides/github-actions/github-action-setup)
